name: Mygithubpage
body:
# **Anirudh Ramachandran**
* Graduate student in Computer Science, NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering.
* [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/anirudhr)
* [Resume](http://anirudhr.me)

***

### At present
**Teaching Assistant**
* CS-GY 6033 Design & Analysis of Algorithms I
* MA-UY 2314 Discrete Mathematics

***

### In the long long ago
**Teaching Assistant**
* CS-GY 6233 Introduction to Operating Systems

**Customer Support Engineer, Cisco Systems, Technical Assistance Center**
* Resolution of technical issues and network-down crises in IP contact center environments.
* Troubleshooting call routing, reporting, database, client software, and Linux server issues.
* Worked with product development teams, and built tools in BASH and Python that enhanced the product and improved issue resolution time by more than 200%.
* Presenter at Cisco Collaboration Partner Summits. Presented talks and lab sessions on troubleshooting techniques and best practices at summits in Sydney and Bangkok.
* Customer outreach with Cisco Support Community: [Profile](http://bit.ly/anirudhCisco), [Newsletter article](http://bit.ly/anirudhNewsletter), [Ask The Experts](http://bit.ly/anirudhAskExpert)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
